text: Letters from the Park () is a 1988 Cuban drama movie directed by Tomás Gutiérrez Alea and starring Víctor Laplace, Ivonne López Arenal, Miguel Paneke, Mirta Ibarra, Adolfo Llauradó, Elio Mesa. == Other websites == * Category:1988 drama movies Category:Cuban movies Category:Movies directed by Tomás Gutiérrez Alea
title: Letters from the Park
